Variable Selection

Aravind Hebbali

library(blorr)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)

Model

model <- glm(y ~ ., data = bank_marketing, family = binomial(link = 'logit'))

Forward Selection

Selection Summary

blr_step_aic_forward(model)
